classmeta.shortdesc: Displays the contents of a cell in a GtkTreeView as a progress bar.

constructor.desc: Creates a new GtkCellRendererProgress. Rendering parameters are adjusted using the object properties. The object properties can be set globally (with set_property). Also, with GtkTreeViewColumn, you can bind a property to a value in a GtkTreeModel. For example, you can bind the "value" property on the cell renderer to a string value in the model, thus rendering a different string in each row of the gtk.TreeView.

prop.shortdesc: The text in the label that will be drawn over the progress bar.

desc.para: The text in the label that will be drawn over the progress bar.

prop.shortdesc: The percentage that the progress bar is "filled in".

desc.para: The percentage that the progress bar is "filled in".
